name: The Zombland: Enter at Your Peril
name_original: The Zombland: Enter at Your Peril
description:
In this chilling game of survival you're on a mission to find your friend Marcus in the scary world of zombies. Marcus went into the zombland but never returned. Will you rescue the kidnapped, or become another victim in the relentless grip of the zombie horde…

The Zombland: Enter at Your Peril is a thrilling zombie game where survival is the ultimate goal. If you survive, you can search for the missing Marcus taken by zombies in their perilous territory. Zombs will do everything to stop you and defend their land. To fight with you, they will come from all directions: sky, land, and water. There will be various types of weapons available for you to protect yourself. The gameplay intensifies across multiple worlds. Each world presents unique challenges, and the player has to make enough kills and stay alive up to certain levels to obtain the key. That key is needed to open the doors for the next stage.
